item.field: Roberto Gómez Bolaños, María Antonieta de las Nieves, Carlos Villagrán, Florinda Meza García, Angelines Fernández Abad, Rubén Aguirre Fuentes, Edgar Vivar, Ramón Gómez Valdez de Castillo
Classic & Cult TV, Kids' TV, Spanish-Language TV Shows
El Chavo is a poor, nameless orphan who lives in an apartment building with La Chilindrina, Quico, Doña Florinda, Don Ramón and Professor Jirafales.
